name: Zamazenta
author: GIDORA
flavor_text: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it beingnknown as the Fighting Master’s Shield.nIt was feared and respected by all.

abilities.name: Metal Shield
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn, this attack does 120 more damage.
